name: Mailchimp Campaigns Plugin
description: Ingest data from Mailchimp Campaigns into PostHog

config.markdown:
**Data center**: Data center shortcode for your account. For example, `us6` corresponds to a base URL of https://us6.api.mailchimp.com/3.0/.

**API key**: Mailchimp API key for your account, for example: `0123456789abcdef0123456789abcde-us6`.
